## a.belongsTo() function

Make a `hasOne()` or `hasMany()` relationship bi-directional using the `belongsTo()` method. The belongsTo() method requires that a hasOne() or hasMany() relationship already exists from parent to the related model.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function belongsTo<RM extends string>(relatedModel: RM): ModelRelationalField<ModelRelationalTypeArgFactory<RM, ModelRelationshipTypes.belongsTo, false, undefined>, RM, "required" | "valueRequired" | "arrayRequired", undefined>;
```

</td><td>

</td><td>

</td></tr>

ModelRelationalField&lt;ModelRelationalTypeArgFactory&lt;RM, ModelRelationshipTypes.belongsTo, false, undefined&gt;, RM, "required" \| "valueRequired" \| "arrayRequired", undefined&gt;

a belong-to relationship definition
